name: Share Me Floating Share Buttons
author: Scott Moses

sections.description:
Quickly create a beautiful floating share buttons. Super fast and does not slow down your site speed.

Overview

Simply Draw This Widget into your Sidebar:

  • Drop your Facebook Page URL into the sidebar URL area.
  • Grow your Facebook page.
  • Get More likes on your blog post
  • Harness Your new Facebook fans and drive more traffic to your website

Features

  • Works with any WordPress Theme
  • Build for speed, won’t slow your site down
  • Intuitive User Interface – easy to use, just turn it on!

Status of Premium

Get on the Waiting List for our Premium Products>>

WordPress.org Support

As this plugin is in the early stages of development, we want to hear from you and get as much feedback as possible ;-). Feel free to visit our website CheekyApps.com and email us with any questions you have.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the F.B. Feed Plus plugin (share-me-socials-by-cheeky-apps.zip) to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Thats it! View any “page” or “post” and you’ll see the new floating buttons!
sections.faq: You’ve noticed a bug, what do you do? This plugin is still in its early stages of development. If you notice a bug please contact us at CheekyApps.com and tell us. We will be more then happy to help out.

short_description: Create a beautiful Facebook Feed Box in your sidgebar. Grow your Facebook page, drive more Facebook traffic to your website, & blog happy.
